Description: McKlein Womens ALYSON Leather Shoulder Tote in Black Fashionable functionality is the M Series mantra and begins with the elegant Gold key chain, exposed zipper, easy access exterior back pocket. Magnetic Closure opens to a fully lined interior compartment. One pocket is perfect for tablets. Easy access front pocket for small items. The other wall of this spacious tote offers double lined zipper & easy access pockets. Black & White Paisley Lining. Gold studded feet for stronger stability. Square outside. Made of Top Grain Leather Elegant Gold Key Chain. Easy Access Exterior back pocket. One pocket perfect for tablets. Two Leather reinforced accesory Slip pockets. The other wall of this spacious tote offers double lined zipper & easy access pockets. Dimension: 16"x6"x12" Return Policy We accept returns and exchanges within 30 days of your order date. Please contact us in order to receive an RMA and a return address. Please allow up to 7 days from the day that we receive the return for the refund to be reflected on your account. For exchanges- please contact us with the item you would like to exchange it to in order for us to confirm its availability. Shipping Free Shipping - We offer free economy shipping on all of our products. If you choose free shipping, the item will ship via the most economical shipping method available, whether it's UPS or USPS. International Shipments Most international shipments are shipped via USPS (UPS is available to Canada as well). Please allow plenty of time for the item to arrive as shipping times vary due to customs and many other factors. Please also note that the import duties, taxes and other charges are not included in the item price and are the buyer's responsibility. Store Policy Positive Feedback and Service - our number one goal is to exceed your expectations. We pride ourselves in excellent customer service and try to treat our customer the way we want to be treated. If you experience any problems with your order or product, please contact us via email or phone. We will do everything we can in order to improve your experience with us. Sales Tax - we collect sales tax for the residents of GA- 7% Payment - Please pay with PayPal. This is the most secure and reliable method of payment Item Condition - All items are brand new with original tags, unless specifically stated otherwise Contact Us - please don't hesitate to contact us with any questions or concerns you might have. You can reach us by phone or through the ebay messaging system. We we will do our best to accommodate any special orders and requests. Embossing Personalize you item for free! We offer free embossing on most of our products. All you need to do is send us the initials you want after the completion of your order. The font for all briefcases, luggage and handbags is Times New Roman size 28". The font for all wallets and smaller items is Times New Roman 14". We can also emboss company logos and other symbols for a fee- please contact us for details. Please note: embossing may take up to three additional business days. Embossed items cannot be return for any reason.
